name: Seance: The Unquiet (Demo 2)
description:
This dramatic VR experience uses a combination of the Unreal videogame engine and the latest in Hollywood-style performance-capture technology to weave a frightening and intriguing tale.

In this second proof-of-concept demo, Holospark shows our approach to dynamic character presence in VR. This demo works with the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive VR headsets. No controllers are required.

Seance will not be produced or released as a full experience. We are continuing to explore the work we did here in other projects such as The Haunted Graveyard which is now available here on Steam.
